original_title: LeapFrog: Letter Factory Adventures - The Letter Machine Rescue Team
overview: Join the Frog Family (Leap, Tad, Lily) and friends on a problem solving adventure! When Quigley announces the new Letter Factory is almost ready to open, the team takes a visit to learn about adjectives and words with consonant blends. But when the letter machine goes on the fritz, it's up to them to work together as 'junior engineers' to find the best fix-it solutions!
tagline: Go on a letter adventure and learn how letters come together through problem solving.
title: LeapFrog: Letter Factory Adventures - The Letter Machine Rescue Team
